professional_summary: Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience developing web applications using Python, JavaScript, and cloud technologies. Passionate about building scalable, maintainable software and mentoring junior developers.

achievements: Redesigned microservice architecture reducing infrastructure costs by 35%

Led migration from monolith to microservices architecture
Mentored junior developers through knowledge sharing sessions

Created comprehensive test suite achieving 92% code coverage
